wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Robert Burns (born 19 September 1955) is a British former swimmer. He competed in two events at the 1976 Summer Olympics.He represented England and won a bronze medal in the 4 x 100 metres freestyle relay, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. He won the 1976 ASA National Championship 100 metres freestyle title.

response: Kevin Burns (1955–2020) is an American television and film producer, director, and screenwriter.
Kevin Burns may also refer to:
* Kevin Burns (fighter) (born 1980), American mixed martial artist
* Kevin Burns (mayor) (born 1958), mayor of North Miami, Florida, 2005–2009
* Kevin Burns (business magnate), former CEO of Juul
